testcase.name: TC01 User should be able to login with valid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given user is on the gmibank homepage.......................................passed And user clicks on account-menu button......................................passed And user selects on "Sign in" button on the dropdown menu...................passed When user enters a valid username "valid_username"..........................passed When user enters a valid password "valid_password"..........................passed And user clicks on -sing in- button.........................................passed Then verify there should be a "sign out" button on the account-menu.........passed
